column1: Conversation

Aramark are buying business - 50% price reductions on existing business. Either they want top sell or they are drumming up new business with little profit margins. Uniforms have dropped, made most profit on Sanitizer and glove sales and this is dropping - Pricing reduced and will have to sell a lot more.
ARMK holding firm after tepid earnings report. Declining sales, flat earnings. PE=24 a bit over prices? Why not a big drop like SYY which posted a better earnings report? Please advise.

New way of life until a vaccine is found in 12 months:Distance learningDistance watching sports eventsNetflixVideo conferencingMinimum travellingStreaming video from empty churchesMusic concerts only possible through onine streaming..No cruise travelling ( small boat cruise for small group likely possible)Perhaps new type of airlines with distancing plus testing passengers when embarking and disembarkingSo how many sectors will be affected with all these restrictions?
Rated Strong Sell. Way overpriced with what they do and their huge debt and declining revenue.
This board is about as exciting as watching a wild kingdom rerun

Aramark is super diversified and is “cleaning up” on uniform, sanitation and cleaning contracts. These contracts are high margins and all facilities are still paying to have their building cleaned and sanitized several time a day.
Who is buying this stock when the whole market is down? Is it people that own call options that are covering their calls?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SYmajDsgPwA GAINING CONTRACTS ??

Aramark chief executive Eric Foss on Nov. 13 that Aramark had record sales and its highest profit margin everThree days later, Aramark announced the company would not match their 401(k) contributions as they promised. Stock down bad management. Need new CEO(Floss makes 20 mil)
WTRH, the only listed online food delivery company will do well in 2020. Restaurants and bars in California are ordered to close again. $ARCO $CAKE $CMG $DNKN $ARMK $CBRL $CNNE $DPZ
HOLD!!

Unlike Aramark, Compass Group is not hiding how their business is hit hard by Covid-19. School, universities will be closed for the remainder of the year. From where will Aramark draw revenue. Museum cafeterias will be closed for months. This will be very though for Aramark.
